aboutFilterLists.description: Link text to uBO's own filter lists repo

aboutPageName.description: appears as tab name in dashboard

aboutPrivacyPolicy.description: Link to privacy policy on GitHub (English)

aboutSourceCode.description: Link text to source code repo

addButton.description: Text for buttons used to add content

autoReloadLabel.description: Label for a checkbox in the options page
autoReloadLabel.message: Automatically reload page when changing filtering mode

backupButton.description: Text for buttons used to back up content

basicFilteringModeDescription.message:
Basic network filtering from selected filter lists.

Does not require permission to read and modify data on websites.

behaviorSectionLabel.description: The header text for the 'Behavior' section

completeFilteringModeDescription.message:
Advanced network filtering plus specific and generic extended filtering from selected filter lists.

Requires broad permission to read and modify data on all websites.

Generic extended filtering may cause higher webpage resources usage.

customFiltersImportExportLabel.description: Text label heading the import/export area of custom filters

customFiltersImportTextareaPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text which describes the purpose of the textarea widget
customFiltersImportTextareaPlaceholder.message: Paste here specific cosmetic filters to add

customFiltersPageName.description: appears as tab name in dashboard

defaultFilteringModeDescription.description: This describes the default filtering mode setting
defaultFilteringModeDescription.message: The default filtering mode will be overridden by per-website filtering modes. You can adjust the filtering mode on any given website according to whichever mode works best on that website. Each mode has its advantages and disadvantages.

defaultFilteringModeSectionLabel.description: The header text for the default filtering mode section

developDropdownLabel.description: A label of a dropdown list

developOptionCustomDnrRules.description: An option in a dropdown list

developOptionDnrRulesOf.description: A section header in a dropdown list

developOptionDynamicRuleset.description: An option in a dropdown list

developOptionFilteringModeDetails.description: An option in a dropdown list

developOptionSessionRuleset.description: An option in a dropdown list

developPageName.description: appears as tab name in dashboard. Inspired from 'Develop' menu in Safari, see https://developer.apple.com/documentation/safari-developer-tools/develop-menu

developerModeLabel.description: Label for a checkbox in the options page

developerModeLegend.description: Short description for a checkbox in the options page
developerModeLegend.message: Enables access to features suitable for technical users.

dnrRulesCountInfo.description: Short sentence to report the number of currently registered DNR rules

dnrRulesWarning.description: Short description of the DNR rules editor pane
dnrRulesWarning.message: Do not add content from untrusted sources

enableStrictBlockLabel.description: Label for a checkbox in the options page

enableStrictBlockLegend.description: Short description for a checkbox in the options page
enableStrictBlockLegend.message: Navigation to potentially undesirable sites will be blocked, and you will be offered the option to proceed.

exportButton.description: Text for buttons used to export content

extShortDesc.description: this will be in the Chrome web store: must be 132 characters or less
extShortDesc.message: An efficient content blocker. Blocks ads, trackers, miners, and more immediately upon installation.

findListsPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the input field used to find lists

importAndAppendButton.description: Text for buttons used to import and append content

noFilteringModeDescription.description: A short description for the editable field which lists trusted sites
noFilteringModeDescription.message: List of websites for which no filtering will take place.

noFilteringModePlaceholder.description: Default text for in edit field

optimalFilteringModeDescription.message:
Advanced network filtering plus specific extended filtering from selected filter lists.

Requires broad permission to read and modify data on all websites.

perRulesetStats.description: Appears aside each filter list in the _3rd-party filters_ pane

pickerCreate.description: Text for the button to create the filter

pickerPick.description: Text for the button to re-enter element-picking mode

pickerPreview.description: Text for the button to activate preview mode

pickerSliderLabel.description: Label to describe the purpose of the slider
pickerSliderLabel.message: Move the slider to select the best match

pickerTipEnter.description: Label for the menu entry to create cosmetic filters

popupFilteringModeLabel.description: Label in the popup panel for the current filtering mode

popupLessButton.description: Label to be used to hide popup panel sections

popupLocalToolsLabel.description: Label in the popup panel for the local tools section

popupMoreButton.description: Label to be used to show popup panel sections

popupTipDashboard.description: English: Click to open the dashboard

popupTipReport.description: Tooltip used for the 'chat' icon in the panel

restoreButton.description: Text for buttons used to restore content

revertButton.description: Text for buttons used to revert changes

saveButton.description: Text for buttons used to save changes

settingsBackupRestoreLabel.description: The header text for the back up/restore section

settingsBackupRestoreLegend.description: Important information about the back up/restore section.
settingsBackupRestoreLegend.message: Restoring will overwrite all your current custom settings.

settingsBackupRestoreSummary.description: A summary description of the back up/restore section.
settingsBackupRestoreSummary.message: Back up your custom settings to a file, or restore your custom settings from a file.

settingsPageName.description: appears as tab name in dashboard

showBlockedCountLabel.description: Label for a checkbox in the options page
showBlockedCountLabel.message: Show the number of blocked requests on the toolbar icon

strictblockBack.description: A button to go back to the previous webpage

strictblockClose.description: A button to close the current tab

strictblockDontWarn.description: Label for checkbox in document-blocked page
strictblockDontWarn.message: Don't warn me again about this site

strictblockNoParamsPrompt.description: Label to be used for the parameter-less URL

strictblockProceed.description: A button to navigate to the blocked page

strictblockReasonSentence1.description: Text informing about what is causing the page to be blocked
strictblockReasonSentence1.message: The page was blocked because of a matching filter in {{listname}}.

strictblockRedirectSentence1.description: Text warning about an incoming redirect
strictblockRedirectSentence1.message: The blocked page wants to redirect to another site. If you choose to proceed, you will navigate directly to: {{url}}

strictblockSentence1.description: Sentence used in the strict-blocked page
strictblockSentence1.message: uBO Lite has prevented the following page from loading:

strictblockTitle.description: Webpage title for the strict-blocked page

supportFindSpecificButton.description: A clickable link in the filter issue reporter section

supportReportSpecificButton.description: Text for button which open an external webpage in Support pane

supportS3P1.description: First paragraph of 'Filter issues' section in Support pane
supportS3P1.message: Report filter issues with specific websites to the uBlockOrigin/uAssets issue tracker. Requires a GitHub account.

supportS5H.description: Label of 'Troubleshooting information' section in 'Report a filter issue' page

supportS6Checkbox1.description: A checkbox to use for NSFW sites
supportS6Checkbox1.message: Label the webpage as “NSFW” (“Not Safe For Work”)

supportS6H.description: Header of 'Report a filter issue' section in Support pane

supportS6P1S1.description: A paragraph in the filter issue reporter section
supportS6P1S1.message: To avoid burdening volunteers with duplicate reports, please verify that the issue has not already been reported. Note: clicking the button will cause the page's origin to be sent to GitHub.

supportS6Select1.description: Label for widget to select type of issue

supportS6Select1Option5.message: Malfunctions when uBO Lite is enabled

supportS6Select1Option7.description: An entry in the widget used to select the type of issue

supportS6URL.description: Label for the URL of the page

unpickerTipEnter.description: Label for the menu entry to delete cosmetic filters

unpickerUsage.description: Summary description on how to use the tool to remove custom filters
unpickerUsage.message: Select a filter below to highlight matching elements in the webpage. Click the trash can to remove a filter.
